item.title:

item.title: The posters for Boots Riley’s ‘I’M A VIRGO’ starring Jharrel Jerome have been released.

item.title:
Andy Muschietti says Ezra Miller will not be recast if a sequel to ‘THE FLASH’ is greenlit.
“I don’t think there’s anyone that can play that character as well as they did.”
(https://theplaylist.net/the-flash-director-andy-muschietti-says-no-one-else-can-replace-ezra-miller-if-theres-a-sequel-20230530/?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Disney and Pixar’s ‘ELEMENTAL’ debuts with a 64% score on Rotten Tomatoes.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Robert Eggers’ NOSFERATU has wrapped filming.
Starring Lily-Rose Depp, Bill Skarsgård, Nicholas Hoult, Willem Dafoe, Emma Corrin & Aaron Taylor-Johnson.
A gothic tale of obsession between a woman (Depp) in 19th century Germany and the ancient vampire (Skarsgård) who stalks her.
item.author: FilmUpdates
